 Galvatron stood up. "This will really bring me close
to death with my training. I hope you will have a cr
chamber waiting. My training methods are not pleasent.
--- dachande <Dachande85@...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Yes, there is," Magmatron said. A map of the
> base came down and lit a way from the conference
> room to the training room.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: kinger01030@... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 8:20 PM
>   Subject: Destron meeting
> 
> 
>   Galvatron watched as Guiledart made his proposal.
> "I like the idea. That way 
>   our approach will be a complete surprise." A light
> switched on in his optic. 
>   His probe had found something. He had sent a probe
> a masquito bot to each 
>   enemy base to scope it otu. He looked at Darkfates
> base. "It seems the preds 
>   have some company. I see omunious Prime. When they
> are done with them they 
>   shall be weakened we should attack then. For now I
> wish to train. Do you have 
>   a training room wich may  alter gravational pull
> in that area." 
>         eGroups Sponsor
